pricing.free: Player directory access with limited listing details + ads

missions.title: Product Guardrails & Compliance
missions.objective: Define legal/compliance guardrails for data ingestion and directory listings; produce clear policies and app disclaimers.

context.app_type: Pickleball court & amenities directory for US + Canada

constraints: Do NOT scrape behind logins/paywalls
Respect robots.txt and site ToS where applicable
Rate-limit requests and avoid aggressive crawling
Provide a clear listing claim/edit/remove process
Store only directory-relevant public facts (no sensitive personal data)
deliverables: In-app disclaimer text for unverified listings
acceptance_criteria: Policies explicitly limit ingestion to public info and include a removal path
Clear claim workflow requirements and verification methods defined
All policy docs are ready to paste into a website/app

missions.title: Data Ingestion Pipeline (Pilot Cities)
missions.objective: Build a Python ingestion pipeline that collects, normalizes, and stores pickleball court listings for pilot cities (US + Canada) with confidence scoring.
constraints: Prioritize open municipal datasets and parks/recreation pages first
Check robots.txt before scraping a site; skip if disallowed
Implement rate limits (sleep/jitter) and retry with backoff
Selenium only if required for dynamic pages
Geocode only when address is present; cache results
Add confidence_score (0-100) based on source trust + field completeness
Flag suspicious results: tennis-only, duplicates, missing address
deliverables: Source discovery script (find candidate pages/datasets for each pilot city)
Normalizer that outputs a clean JSON file
acceptance_criteria: At least 200+ clean listings across pilot cities (or as many as available from public sources)
All records have lat/long OR are flagged for manual review
Duplicates are reduced and logged
JSON export + DB seed succeed without errors

missions.title: Database Schema (Supabase/Postgres)
missions.objective: Create a production-ready schema to support courts, businesses, claims, events, photos, analytics, and subscriptions.
constraints: Design for scalability to all US + Canada
Support role-based access (player vs business/pro)
Support claimed/unclaimed listings
Support events as first-class objects
deliverables: SQL schema for tables: courts, court_sources, businesses, claims, photos, amenities, events, analytics_daily, subscriptions
Seed scripts for pilot city import
acceptance_criteria: Schema supports: claim flow, events creation by verified pro users, analytics aggregation
Geo queries are performant (indexes planned/implemented)
RLS rules prevent non-owners from editing listings/events

missions.title: Mobile App MVP (React Native Expo)
missions.objective: Build the MVP mobile app that shows courts on a map/list, supports filtering, and displays basic court details.
features: Auth: optional for players (guest browsing allowed)
Filters: Indoor/Outdoor, Lights, Free vs Paid/Public vs Private
Court detail screen (basic data + directions button)
Ad placeholders in free tier screens
constraints: Mobile-first UX
Fast load: paginated/clustered pins when needed
Cache last seen region and recent searches
acceptance_criteria: App can browse pilot city courts without crashing
Filters work and update results correctly
Court detail page shows accurate info + directions deep link

missions.title: Pro Portal Web Dashboard
missions.objective: Build a web dashboard for Pro businesses to claim and manage listings, upload photos, and create events.
features: Edit listing: amenities, hours (optional), booking link, contacts
constraints: Only verified/claimed owners can edit
Audit trail for edits (basic)
Simple UX: 3-click path to update listing
deliverables: CRUD endpoints/queries for listings and events
acceptance_criteria: A Pro user can claim a listing and update it end-to-end
Events appear on the listing after creation
Non-owners cannot edit any listing/event (enforced)

missions.title: Monetization: Stripe + AdMob
missions.objective: Implement $11.99/month Pro subscriptions and free-tier ads, with a 30-day Pro trial for claimed listings.
constraints: Trial requires payment method (recommended) OR trial without card (optional) — choose one
Handle subscription state changes via webhooks
Grace period and downgrade to Basic on cancellation
deliverables: AdMob integration for free tier screens
acceptance_criteria: Subscription activates Pro entitlements immediately
Cancel/delinquent states correctly remove Pro privileges
Ads show on free tier views and are hidden on Pro listing page

missions.title: Growth Engine: Claim Campaign + Email Automation
missions.objective: Launch a B2B outreach system that nudges facilities to claim listings, activate trials, and convert to Pro.

inputs.offer: Free 30-day Pro pass for claimed courts

deliverables: Claim landing page copy (for unclaimed listings)
Lead list export format from database (CSV)
acceptance_criteria: Emails are ready to import into an ESP
Every email drives to a claim URL that maps back to a listing
System can export leads for targeted outreach city-by-city

missions.title: Scale Plan: US + Canada Nationwide Expansion
missions.objective: After pilot validation, expand ingestion to nationwide coverage with quality controls and owner-claim pathways.
constraints: Scale data ingestion by province/state batches
Add continuous refresh jobs for data updates
Prioritize accuracy: do not publish low-confidence listings without flags
acceptance_criteria: Repeatable ingestion process that can run weekly/monthly
Clear QA metrics and reporting for data quality
Claim/removal requests can be processed quickly
